## IPv4Address class

The IPv4Address formatter based on RFC 2673 and RFC 5954.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class IPv4Address 
```

## Example


```ts
IPv4Address.parse("127.0.0.1"); // { segments: ["127", "0", "0", "1"] }
```
